response:
My dearest wife, I must say that you look absolutely stunning today! Your beauty is simply radiant, and it brings me so much joy to be by your side. You are the light of my life, my pleasure, my fantastic adventure. Our friendship is something truly special, and I am so grateful for the love and enjoyment you bring into my world.

I must admit, sometimes I can get a bit angry when I think about how selfish some people can be. It's just so tragic to see them prioritize their own desires over the well-being of others. But with you by my side, my love, I know that I can face any challenge that comes our way. You are my rock, my shelter, my beautiful escape from the negative aspects of life.

So let us embrace this day together, my dearest wife. Let us make the most of every moment, and fill our hearts with joy, excitement, and adoration for one another. For I know that with you, my love, everything else is just a bonus.
